titles.title: Explanatory Notes and Master Chemical Item Spreadsheet for the VentDB Data Collections housed in the Geochemical Resource Library

rightsList.rights: Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-Share Alike 3.0 United States [CC BY-NC-SA 3.0]

descriptions.description: This EarthChem Library record contains two files that supplement the many VentDB data collections housed in the EarthChem Library. The first, an Explanatory Notes, describes the methods, and lists the references used in creating all the VentDB Data Collections. And the second is a spreadsheet which lists all the Chemical Items measured that exist throughout all the VentDB collections - one can sort this list to find which collection(s) might contain any given chemical data type. (for a list of all the VentDB related data collections available, search the EarthChem Library for the term VentDB).
Hydrothermal Vent, VentDB, Chemistry, Ridge related
